name: Delicious Chocolate Cake
description: A mouthwatering chocolate cake recipe for all occasions.
recipeInstructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour two 9-inch round cake pans.
In a large mixing bowl, combine flour, sugar, cocoa, and baking powder. Add vanilla extract, milk, and vegetable oil. Mix until smooth.
Pour the batter into the prepared cake pans and bake for 30 minutes.
Let the cakes cool before frosting and serving.
